name: 光學（二）
description: 本課程接續光學(一)課程內容, 介紹光學與光電工程所需相關知識。使學生對於光的特性與光學的理論及應用有廣泛的認識與瞭解。
goals: 干涉與繞射原理及其應用
syllabus:
週次

教學進度

1

A Brief Overview & Review of Geometrical & Matrix Optics

2

Review of Basic Mathematics of Scalar Waves & Fresnel Equations

3

Gaussian Beam Optics

4

Gaussian Beam Transformation + \[In-class Test (1)\]

5

Optical Resonators

6

Polarization Optics: Jones Vectors and Jones Calculus (I)

7

Polarization Optics: Jones Vectors and Jones Calculus (II)

8

Mid-Term Test: 期中測驗評量

9

Optical Anisotropy & Optical Indicatrix

10

Coherence & Dispersion

11

Interference & Interferometers

12

Holography; Basic Concepts and Mathematics + \[In-class Test (2)\]

13

Diffraction (I): Basic Concepts & Mathematics

14

Diffraction (II): Point-Spread Function and Diffraction–Limited Two-Point Resolution, Diffraction Gratings

15

A Brief Introduction to Laser Theory

16

Electro-optic & Acousto-optic Effects & Devices

17

A Brief Introduction to Nonlinear Optics

18

期末測驗評量
